name.zh: 日常竖拉链口袋双肩包（多颜色）

description.en: A clean everyday backpack featuring a vertical front zip pocket, spacious main compartment, and side bottle pocket. OEM/ODM customization available for fabric (including recycled options), colorways, logo patch, lining, pockets, and packaging.
description.zh: 简洁日常双肩包，前幅竖向拉链口袋便捷取物，主仓容量充足，并配有侧边水杯袋。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、配色、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构与包装等。

en: Outer: Polyester / Nylon (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Padding: Foam/EVA padding for straps & back panel (customizable)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：涤纶/尼龙（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
背负：肩带/背部可加海绵/EVA 衬垫（可定制）

en.Front Pocket: Vertical zip pocket for quick access
en.Compartments: 1 main compartment + internal sleeve (optional) + side bottle pocket
en.Customization: Fabric, color, logo, lining, pocket layout, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.收纳结构: 1 主仓 + 内部夹层（可选）+ 侧边水杯袋
zh.可定制: 面料配色、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
